description: I have completed Masters in Computer Science from The University of Iowa where I was advised by Dr. Padmini Srinivasan and co-advised by Dr. Zubair Shafiq. My research focused on using Natural Language Processing and Machine Learning to enhance user privacy. I also have a keen interest in the field of Software Engineering. Previously, I worked at TPI Lab in LUMS under the supervision of Dr. Fareed Zaffar.

highlights.JULY 2021: Started full-time as an AI/ML Engineer at GSK.
highlights.MAY 2021: Completed Masters in Computer Science from The University of Iowa.
highlights.JULY 2020: Virtually presented a paper at ACL Main Conference 2020.
highlights.MAY 2020: Started Internship as AI/ML Engineer at GSK.
highlights.APR 2020: Our paper titled "A Girl Has A Name: Detecting Authorship Obfuscation" got published in ACL 2020.
highlights.JAN 2020: Served as an external reviewer in PoPETs 2020.
highlights.SEPT 2019: Achieved 6th position out of 55 submissions at PAN 2019, for model detecting Humans vs Bots on Twitter.
highlights.JUL 2019: Presented our paper at PoPETs in Stockholm, Sweden.
highlights.JUN 2019: Our paper titled "A Girl Has No Name: Automated Authorship Obfuscation using Mutant-X" got published in PoPETs.
highlights.AUG 2018: Joined The University of Iowa for Masters in Computer Science.
highlights.AUG 2017: Joined LUMS as a Research Assistant under Dr. Fareed Zaffar.
highlights.JUN 2017: Joined TPI LUMS as a ROR Web Developer Intern.
highlights.SEPT 2016: Joined FASTCARE Lahore Chapter as a lead Graphic Designer.
highlights.MAR 2016: Joined NUCES ACM Lahore Chapter as a Graphic Designer.
highlights.AUG 2014: Started Bachelor's in Computer Science from FAST NU (Lahore Campus).
